The images are blurred because I have resized it to 14*14

This has been found by running the test.py which uses the pretrained weights(b1.npy etc)

The most of the z's for input sample are close to 0 ie (>1e-5) hence the objective is achieved
Using these z's we can regenerate the x

As we can see I generated the average value of zm's over i ie average of zm(i);i over n=60000(here)

[1/N(sigma(zm(i)))]

and it is close to the s=0.05
